verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Njoo kwetu, masiya (njoo);
Njoo, Bwana, utukoe. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nguvu za shetani
zimetubana,
njia ya uwingu haipitiki.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Utufungulie mlango
wa mbingu,
na kuyatakasa maovu yote.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nazo dhambi zetu
zimetusonga,
kamba za mauti zatuzunguka.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ee Yesu Masiya,
mwenye huruma,
njoo hima Bwana utuokoe.
